message.content: You're an expert in the providing instructions, and I require your guidance on a few matters. Could you please provide instructions to help me accomplish the following tasks? generated:
Sannan za ka taimaka min shiga a cikin shafin yanar gizon.-

1. Shiga a cikin shafin intanet a kan URL na shafin yanar gizon.
2. Bayan da ka shiga a kan shafin, ka zauna a kan shafin yanar gizon.
3. Wannan za ka yi ingancin bayani game da abin da ka so.
4. Idan shafin yanar gizon ya ba ka da "Sign up" ko "Register" bincike, ka zauna a kan binciken da za ka saita.
5. Ka kara saita katin yanar gizon da ka so ya fi kunshe a cikin binciken.
6. Bayan saita, ka kara shigar da bayanai masu amfani game da adireshin mail, sunan, hanyar bayanai, da sauran alamar da aka buɗe a cikin bincike.
7. Bayan da ka kara shigar da bayanai, ka kara kirkirar wannan da za ka so, da kuma yi saituna.
8. Bayan yi saituna, ka fasa a cikin mail inbox na adireshin mail da ka taɓa.
9. Ka ɗauki adireshin mail na shafin yanar gizon, kada ka sake saita.
10. Bayan sa, ka zauna a kan mail inbox, ka kara saita mail daga shafin yanar gizon.
11. Bayan sa, ka zauna a kan mail da aka taɓa, ka saita mail daga shafin.
12. Bayan da ka saita mail, ka kara saita katin yanar gizon da za ka so.
13. Bayan sa, ka kara shigar da bayanai masu amfani game da adireshin mail, sunan, hanyar bayanai, da sauran alamar da aka buɗe a cikin bincike.
